title: Need Help to Reset Password
body: Recently my friend gave me an account and I want to change the password, however, neither of us have access to the email of the account.

replies.body:
First off, account sharing is strictly not allowed. It's meant to help protect peoples accounts from being stolen out from under them. 

If you're needing to recover *your* account, you can start the process by reaching out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). You're going to need to be able to answer some questions regarding the account in order to prove you were the one who created it, however.
